title: What is the equation of the ellipse with centre at (0,0), major axis on the y-axis and passing through the points (3, 2) and (1,6)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let the eqn. of an ellipse is:- x^2/b^2+y^2/a^2 =1…………..(1) It passes through the point (3,2) and (1,6) 9/b^2+4/a^2=1…………….(2) 1/b^2+36/a^2=1………………(3) On solving eqn. (2) & (3) a^2 = 40. , b^2=10 Equation of. ellipse. is:- x^2/10+y^2/40=1 or. 4x^2+ y^2= 40. Answer.
